description:
A set of rare items that revives and heals your entire party by 50% and restores their BP by 3.

Spirit Incense x 5
Brave Seed x 5

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel IV: Spirit Incense Set 1
